website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a projector that can handle 3D video, this model is going to be a good choice.
pros: Small and portable with decent image quality
cons: This is a nice portable unit, but it doesn't shine as brightly as you might need in an office environment

customer_reviews.title: Awesome h-9
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent! . the os is a little crappy but I use a fire stick to fix that . Very bright very clear and quiet, in eco mode it's practically silent, none of my pictures are on a screen and most are in lighting
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing projector in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Great project! I've used it watch the start of the NFL season simply by connecting my laptop and displaying it on a wall in my man cave. Amazing large picture! Will be using for my first presentation this week and AJ can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: HERMAN  ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: This is a low budget HALF WAY smart projector
customer_reviews.text: Cons: I don't think this projector is 3500 lumens, i beleave its the same as h8 2500 lumens. The morror casting is junk is always freezes and kicks you off. Does not pull media off micro SD slot. Neutral - not sure if it reads the usb port, interface is super minimal I mean really basic! To basic! I almost think that this thing was really ment for hard wire like HDMI, WiFi mirroring Bluetooth do not work all that great Pros: it is small and portable, image quality is just OK does have HDMI that works good, does have wifi I actually bought bought this to mirror off my phone doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: If you have all the lights turned out then it works fine. Should be best suited for home use to ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this projector and should listened to the comments based on using it in an office environment. This projector is not bright enough to do presentations in a room with any ambient light. We turned off every light we could with out sitting in total darkness and the picture is too faded out to see. Very disappointing. If you have all the lights turned out then it works fine. Should be best suited for home use to watch something off your iPad. Do not buy if you want use for business meetings. You will be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon S. Spratt

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and super affordable and so easy to use. I've had this product for several months now and it works great and super easy to operate and great screen quality. Great value. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: toothfairy

customer_reviews.title: Great projector! Lots of features in such a small item!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a great product, it has meet my expectations completely with everything I was looking for to obtain: image quality, connectivity with iPhone, surround sound bar thru Bluetooth, Wifi stability, LAN (UTP cable) connection for Cable TV. Perhaps the only thing I would have mention or would have being a good to know is the resolution for outdoor (terraces) in day light is not as strong as I thought a 3500 lumens is for real. With a screen it will improve a lot, when I get it I will add to this review!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Vega Sancho

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: The extra money spent for the operating system is not worth it. This thing consistently fails to play videos from apps and web browsing.. basically the HDMI input is all that works and for the price you can get much better if all you use is the HDMI input
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: WOWOTO H9 VIDEO PROJECTOR
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away. It's only been less than an hour since I installed it. This. Is. Amazing. I'm so happy I got this -- I almost went for the H8 then I saw that they just launched the H9. Currently watching Netflix - super sharp, really good sound, easy navigation and controls. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: adventurejunkie

customer_reviews.title: Ideal small projector with everything
customer_reviews.text: This unit has all the features for all kinds of applications. I have used it for business presentations to watching movies on the wall. This has all the connections needed to meet all needs.
customer_reviews.author: LESTER

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice if you could adjust the size of the display ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and as stated on the website description. Would have been nice if you could adjust the size of the display without having to move it back and forth. Otherwise, very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Flores

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. Setting it up was easy, although I haven't been able to pair it up to my phone, but it has Netflix already loaded and I was able to download HBO Now easily from the app store. Thus, I've been watching movies as though I were at the theater! I was able to pair it up to an external speaker and that significantly improved the sound quality. I used projectors for work before and I've noticed that they can get overheated fast. This Wowotto can stay on for a long time and I haven't felt it overheated. A great product and with the discount, a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Nova

customer_reviews.title: Dead after three month light use
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product. Today it stopped powering on for some reason. It is just a waste of money. I think the DC input power was low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henrich

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth it
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing, very clear and high quality image. I don't have a screen, and playing on a cream colored wall and the image is about 120". Used it with a regular DVD which was ok, same quality as a regular tv. With Blu Ray or ultra hd Netflix subscription, the graphics are Great!! Haven't tested the 3d portion yet, will update when I get the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Shak

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product !
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful, compact video projector is wonderful -- it is small, lightweight, very bright, easy to use -- just a really great product! Buy the 3500-lumen version so that you have great brightness if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Light output dimmed to the point of uselessness after less than a year of ordinary use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March. It is Now the end of December. The image has, sometime over the course of the last couple of weeks, dimmed drastically. I can barely see what I'm watching in complete darkness. I dont know how this is even possible (can an led bulb decrease in output or does it burn out at once?) In any case, I've owned it less than a year, and now it's completely useless as anything more than a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Image won't stay in focus
customer_reviews.text: Actually loved the projector since the day I got it, great value for a projector full of options. However, I've noticed that the more I use it, the more obviously there is an issue with the lense not being in focus. At this point I can focue the middle, or the side of the viewing image, but not the whole image will be in focus. Really a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Adam V.

customer_reviews.title: this is a good projector. The picture quality can be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good projector. The picture quality can be a little brighter and the natural colors could be a little more accurate. I guess the H9 version addresses the brightness issue; the price is higher though so that should be taken into account. The 3D function is amazing and you would feel just as good perhaps better than going to a Cinema. Customer service is fast and courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Want a portable projector... This is the best, stop looking, you've found it. This is my 4 "cheap" projector, and even though it's the most expensive of the bunch, after doing research and comparing with other more expensive models this is the best bang for buck
customer_reviews.author: Ian	Buyerman

customer_reviews.title: 💯
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the beat portable video projector, bought it about a year maybe 2 years ago, and let me tell u it’s still working and the quality is amazing, you can connect your Roku , firestick, and even mirror your computer , 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Castro

customer_reviews.title: Really great. Connected it to my fire stick
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Connected it to my fire stick. These pictures are from my textured beige wall. Cant wait to see how it looks like on a projector screen. Also connected to my phone through ushare. It was a gift from my husband and he is so excited to have movie night outside and also for gaming and baseball season. Some pictures are at 70 inches in my living room wall and others in my room at about 100 inches. Neither walls are white. Sound is ok. I connected it to my wunderboom Bluetooth speaker for more sound.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this projector two or three times a week for about 1-2 hours at a time since I received it in July and I had been happy with the projector. It's now January and the projector now only displays a still image of black and white dots with a flickering strip down the middle. I have not mistreated the projector in any way and I expected at least 4 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kopec

customer_reviews.title: Its ok projector, not good for AirPlay but great for online stream
customer_reviews.text: Its ok projector, everything working good, image quality is good when turn off all light and completely dark. AirPlay working ok (video quality drop when using AirPlay). Need to buy wireless mouse and keyboard to type faster.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable but needs home theatre equipment
customer_reviews.text: poor remote responsiveness and audio is pretty bad on some netflix content... can barely hear it. with a sound system and a projector screen it will work great though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Good but Needs more power, lumens, brightness
customer_reviews.text: Good little projector. Small and portable. However, it's best for a dark room. It doesn't work well in a lighted room. The lumens are not powerful enough for business use.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Projector not working
customer_reviews.text: My projector does not switch on after using it for a year. Trying to contact customer support for the last 3 weeks and could not connect with them to help resolve this issue as the product is from China. I do NOT recommend this projector as this is fragile, will not work for long and no support after sales.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great picture for such a small unit. This replaced our older and out dated larger unit and we are impressed with the quality of the picture. The sound is not great at all, we hooked it up to the home theater to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small + smart + Quiet + very light + The sound is great
customer_reviews.text: wonderful wonderful wonderful. The device is unfair in terms of non-liability. I was shocked after his experience Give him 9 out of 10 Best Small Device Failure of 2018 Daytime lighting is good ---- i have LGPF1500 THE WOWOTO H9 He is the best
customer_reviews.author: MUTLAQ A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic product. Works just as described. The only downfall is the lack of instructions. All it comes with is a quick start guide. There isn't even a link to a full manual. I'm still not sure how to use some features.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin K.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about a month and have really enjoyed it. Seems to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cakeview LLC

customer_reviews.title: Poor software and customer service. Great size and screen resolution.
customer_reviews.text: The new software update has caused numerous issues and WOWOTO has poor customer service. They do not provide user friendly means to fix the software issues. A great purchase if not for these problems. I recommend another brand. Cannot use with Netflix or Hulu.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burkeen

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Prime Day. A year later, the projector stopped working. The seller was wonderful about supporting me to make sure that I had a working projector. 5 star service! Thank you very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Great Projection, bad OS
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the android OS. It’s not the latest versions or compatible with many applications. I elected to permanently use a Chromecast plugged in to cast/ stream from my favorite apps.
customer_reviews.author: M Winegard

customer_reviews.title: Out of 5 mini projectors this one is my favorite. It’s very bright and super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Out of 5 mini projectors this one is my favorite. It’s very bright and super quiet. The digital zoom is a nice feature also the 3-D on it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping good sound quality but was let down
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was sloppy. Projector should be inside small white bag but was outside. Picture quality is very good but disappointed with inbuilt speaker quality. Paying nearly $500 at least should worth picture and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months before DMD chip burned out
customer_reviews.text: I didnt use the projector much at all, and within 6 months the DMD chip blew and all I can see is black and white dots. spending 400 on a product that immediately requires a 300 dollar repair? I'll buy a TV thanks
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: The D900 is awesome the picture pops off the wall
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, I had a 3D TV for a couple of years and was not all that impressed with 3D even on a 70 screen Sony. The D900 is awesome the picture pops off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Techcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far! I connect it to my laptop via HDMI and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Used for students in team sports. Used to show members various plays as visual work better than verbal information
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: this is a handy, portable, many featured projector with a major flaw... it just doesn't project bright enough unless the room is almost totally dark! I've attached a picture of 2 similar screens. The one on the left is a school projector showing a live TV feed, and the one on the right is the Wowoto H8 white. I was hoping to show a spreadsheet on the right but you have to be standing so close to the screen because the image is so dark. I tried working with the brightness setting but it didn't seem to help or change much at all. There is NO WAY I would ever consider replacing my TV with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I just love this projector... Best picture, light weight very easy to carry. The only down size is the speacker, but that problem is easy to fix by connecting a good speacker to the projector via, bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Ber

customer_reviews.title: ... first projector ever and i can honestly say i love it! it’s super HD and the whole family ...
customer_reviews.text: my first projector ever and i can honestly say i love it! it’s super HD and the whole family enjoys it, it’s like having our own mini movie theater in the comfort of our living room. can’t wait to use this next summer for the World Cup!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Missing AV cable; Optical output does not work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find out no AV cable included, despite the fact both Amazon description and owner's manual say included an AV cable. Also optical output does not work at all, no signal coming out from optical/digital cable.
customer_reviews.author: hao luo

customer_reviews.title: Wowoto H9
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to boot & got stuck on the Smart Projector screening. It is portable & good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture. Travel with it for training
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful product. Fantastic picture. Travel with it for training. Project TV and movies at home. Does everything you need. Has issues with Google, however. Looking for feedback in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing projector picture quality it's the best I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Was super excited to receive the projector but was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive the projector but was a little disappointed. The unit arrived looked refurbished. Projector works fine but kodi is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: ok projector
customer_reviews.text: its just some of the apps will not run like because of the firmware
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!! Very clear and bright picture.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture! Awesome apps and features. Had this projector since February, I use it at least 2hrs a day and it hasn’t given me any problems. Great product for a great price. If your a movie or game lover I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, better to run streaming through a computer or blue ray. Flat high reflective white paint from Sherwin Williams helped big time. 3D blue ray is awesome if your wall is large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel David Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best projected ever.... feels like your in the movies have it install in a 84" screen projector... really clear..
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: I would've given it five stars but The remote does ...
customer_reviews.text: I would've given it five stars but The remote does not work. However the projector is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this, is going to be a great companion, great buy, no mistake
customer_reviews.author: alejandro f. lerner

customer_reviews.title: Get the bop glasses too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Worked great and did everything I expected it too and more. Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best projector ever I use it with my Fire stick!
customer_reviews.author: Qn$88

customer_reviews.title: Bright lamp, small and portable, Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector for the money. Bright, Bluetooth is awesome. 3D works fantastic. Highly recommended for your home theatre.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: From evert point it kış super, marvelous. Silent, powerful light, wi-fi, small, ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Edit: this is excelent the wifi problem was mi router Almost excellent, but one problem, the wifi keeps reconnecting every 5 minutes Image 100% Sound output 100% Remote control 100% Apps 100% Wifi 20% the range is too short Can i put a wifi dongle to fix this?? Edit: i dont know why, but the reconnect problem it only happens in my house's wifi, i tried another one and it works flawless. But i found another problem, the RAM is so thiny 1GB and you cant erase some garbage apps like bbc news and chrome and other apps that uses ram and the playback on youtube it does goes weird that on Plex too
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: for the price get something better color and focus lens terrible the 3d is great ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price get something better color and focus lens terrible the 3d is great but color look terrible they advertise 3500 lumens but is not my old optoma 3000 lumens is way brighter color this little projector the price is way up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wifi connection is easy to set up as well as downloading apps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my Epson projector died...this projector exceeded my expectations on all levels. The picture is crisp and clear and I had no problems mirroring my iPhone and pairing my Bose blue tooth speaker. The wifi connection is easy to set up as well as downloading apps. I paid double for my Epson and it didn't have near the features nor the picture quality of this compact projector. I can't wait to take it on my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: mp calif

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and alot of perks with this streaming projector
customer_reviews.text: Good buy and alot of perks with this streaming projector!!!!! Nice addition to my man cave!!! I am shocked with the quality picture with this mini projector and it's portable if needed not big and bulky my youngins are amazed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a toy, don't buy if you want a projector with power enough to be able to see presentation screen. Looks cool, but that's it
customer_reviews.text: Very overrated. Seriously misrepresented at 2000 lumens. Image is so dark as to be impossible to see unless lights in conference room turned down to the point to dark for people to write, even after going in settings and increasing brightness to 100% (which was no different than default 50%). Have used lots of projectors in office settings, so have good comparisons to what should be acceptable. Had screen less than 8-10' from good quality screen, no windows so ambient light was not problem. Never have written a negative review before, but don't buy this unless you just want a cool looking toy, as that's all it is.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Witty

customer_reviews.title: Item was not in good condition when received
customer_reviews.text: Item was not in good condition when received. Item had signs of previous usage such as finger prints and scratches around the projector.
customer_reviews.author: abraham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Picture was good but too small of projector for my use
customer_reviews.author: Richard desales

product_meta.title: WOWOTO H9 Video Projector, 3500 lumens 3D DLP Projector 1280x800 Support 1080P Full HD, Android 4.4 OS, with Keystone, HDMI, WiFi & Bluetooth
product_meta.description: Size:H9| Color:H9 3500 lumenAbout WOWOTO: WOWOTO is the fruit of Technology and Design of CVIM Technology Co., Ltd. CVIM Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 as a developer and manufacturer of LED projectors, dedicating to bringing clients outstanding products, so that everyone can enjoy the charm of projection technology then a smart and perfect life. Specifications: Model: H9 Display technology: TI DLP Light source: RGB LED Connection with PC & Phone: HDMI/VGA Brightness: 350 ansi (3500 lumens) Native resolution: 1280 x 800 Contrast ratio: 10000:1 LED light source : 30,000 hours Throw ratio: 1.2:1 Screen size (diagonal): 20"- 180" Color temperature: 7500-9000 Kelvin Focus: Manual Internal speaker: 2W 3D / 2D to 3D conversion 3D: 3D / 2D to 3D Output: 3.5 mm audio out jack for headphone/SPDIF External Memory: USB, Micro SD Input port: HDMI, VGA, AV, USB Supported video formats: H.264, H.263, VC-1, MPEG-1/2/4, DIVX-3/4/5/ 6, XVID, WMV7/8, VP8,VP6, AVS Supported audio formats: MP3, WMA, OGG, FLAC, APE, ATRA Supported photo formats: JPEG, GIF, BMP Size: 158(L)*120(W)*31(H)mm Weight: 400g Package 1x Video Projector 1x Power Adapter 1x AV Cable 1x HDMI Cable 1x Remote Controller 1x Quick Start Guide Seller Warranty: - 30-Day Money Back Guarantee - 12 Month Warranty - Lifetime Support Guarantee Tips 3D Glasses: Please prepare DLP-Link 3D glasses to enjoy 3D movie or game amazing effect.
feature_bullets: 【Superior Home Theater】WOWOTO H9 uses DLP technology, with LED light source providing 3500 lumens brightness, 65% brighter than ordinary projectors. It has auto keystone correction +/- 40 degree vertical, supports 1080P full hd videos and 3D videos, providing vivid and sharp images with big screen up to 200inch. You can easily enjoy movies on big screen at home!
【Smart Android Projector】With Android operation system and dual band 2.4G/5G WiFi, you can download Apps like Netflix, YouTube to stream videos, WPS to show text files.

【Strong Connectivity】Besides plugging in via USB, HDMI, or AV to play media from a laptop, flash drive, or TV box or stick, WOWOTO H9 also provides wireless connection with smartphones, tablets, laptops via Airplay/WLAN/Miracast/Ushare to play videos, games, images, musics or files.

【Low Noise and Long Life】Built in quiet fan and temperature control induction is set in the projector to monitor the temperature and adjust the fan speed in real time. LED light source is about ten times lifetime than that of traditional light source.
【Warranty Services】WOWOTO offers customers 30-day money back, 12-month maintenance warranty, and lifetime support guarantee.If you have any questions, contact us freely, we will response ASAP.
